title: Must I listen to family members if they ask me to break ties of kinship? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: and word says my grandmother and aunts do not like it when I'm in contact with my grandfather's sight what to do don't listen to them connecting your next of kin such as your parents relatives your grandparents relatives is an obligation so if your parents or one of them tells you not to contact one of your kinship ignore them however be diplomatic be polite be dutiful but and try not to head-on collide with them just don't even tell them but you have to not listen to them
